# https://docs.n8n.io/ llms.txt

- [n8n Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/): Comprehensive documentation for n8n workflow automation tool.
- [Coding in n8n](https://docs.n8n.io/code/): Explore coding capabilities and resources in n8n workflows.
- [n8n Credentials Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/credentials/): Learn to manage and share credentials in n8n.
- [Self-hosting n8n](https://docs.n8n.io/hosting/): Guidance for self-hosting n8n with installation and configuration tips.
- [n8n Integrations Overview](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/): Explore n8n integrations for building complex workflows easily.
- [n8n Embed Overview](https://docs.n8n.io/embed/): White label n8n for commercial software integration and support.
- [n8n Workflows Guide](https://docs.n8n.io/workflows/): Learn to create and manage workflows in n8n.
